text: heliri; ‘‘navu allahanalli hagu namage enannu ilisikodalagideyo adaralli hagu ibrahim, isma'il, is‌hak, ya'akub mattu avara santatigalige enannu ilisikodalagitto adaralli hagu musa, isa mattu itara pravadigalige avara odeyanu enannu dayapalisiddano adaralli visvasavirisiruvevu. Navu avara pyeki yara visayadallu taratamya toruvudilla. Navu avanige (allahanige) muslimaragiruvevu (saranagiruvevu)’’
